meanings.definition: Bradding (verb): the act of cooking food over an open flame
meanings.sent1: I enjoy bradding hot dogs on the campfire.
meanings.sent2: My dad is bradding burgers on the barbecue.
meanings.sent3: The chef was bradding marshmallows for the s'mores.
meanings.sent4: The flames danced around the skewers as they were bradding the kebabs.
meanings.sent5: The delicious aroma of bradding meat filled the air.

meanings.definition: Bradding (noun): a method of preparing food by grilling it
meanings.sent1: Grilling is a form of bradding that adds a smoky flavor to the food.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant specializes in the art of bradding various meats.
meanings.sent3: At the picnic, everyone joined in the bradding of vegetables and chicken.
meanings.sent4: The backyard was filled with the enticing smell of bradding during the barbecue.
meanings.sent5: The secret to perfect bradding lies in the right seasoning and timing.

meanings.definition: Bradding (adjective): relating to the process of grilling food
meanings.sent1: The bradding aroma from the grill made everyone hungry.
meanings.sent2: The chef's special sauce enhanced the bradding flavor of the steak.
meanings.sent3: The bradding techniques used by the cook were impressive.
meanings.sent4: The backyard party was a bradding extravaganza with all kinds of grilled dishes.
meanings.sent5: The sizzle of the bradding meat was music to our ears.
